messages.message:
Hi team, using "extraction" prompting in Build (UAT) I'm getting some inconsistencies. Think this has been flagged, but just as an additional example:
• Sales tax field is returning natural language in addition to sales tax
• One document just returns "the document includes a sales tax amount" without pulling the sales tax
*This is running docs through an app

hi, It looks like a model mistake
can you check if changing `sales_tax` to `sales_tax_amount` solves the issue?
maybe for some reason, the model thinks that by `sales_tax` we ask about the boolean value whether this exists in the doc
@Rafal looks like it's still missing it. might be an OCR issue... when I extract all the prices in that column it is pulling "fleet maint package" as $97 (bleeding 9 & 7 together?)

yeah, would be useful to see the ocr text
do you have this pdf somewhere to share?

yeah, looks like this is an OCR issue
this is what model is seeing at that area



```                      1  01119    TIRE   ROTATION     -   NO  CHARGE
                       
                         11932    FLEET   MAINT    PACKAGE/CVI              9.99                           97  aN
                         SALES    TAX  AMOUNT
                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                           OTHER    SALES    AND    SERVICE                       113.06
                       
                                                          TOTAL   AMOUNT                                  120.78    ```
the text next to `SALES TAX AMOUNT` is empty on the right

maybe some OCR tweaks would help with that :thinking_face:
cc @Hari
